title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Competencies: Deformation Design of Soft Self-Responsive Materials: Machine Learning and Evolution

context.prior_knowledge: Linear algebra, basic physics concepts, and foundational programming skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the deformation mechanism of Soft Magnetorheological Materials (SMRM) through physical modeling and mathematical approaches.
Learners can apply a design methodology combining machine learning (FCNN) and evolutionary algorithms to practical problems.
Learners can perform inverse design processes for magnetization profiles to achieve target deformations under given magnetic field conditions.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
